00209 inline byte RMDriverPref::getCostA() const 
00210 {
00211    return ( m_cost >> 24 ) & 0xff;
00212 }
00213 
00214 
00215 inline byte RMDriverPref::getCostB() const 
00216 {
00217    return ( m_cost >> 16 ) & 0xff;
00218 }
00219

00222 {
00223    return ( m_cost >> 8 ) & 0xff;

00228 {
